snippet: Mr. Cruz is said to place a distinctly softer emphasis on some of his most stridently conservative views when privately addressing people who might find them offensive.
abstract: Sen Ted Cruz, who is known for espousing staunch conservative attitude on social issues, has begun modulating his tone while courting donors; some say Cruz has been disingenuous in selectively softening his views and associating with people who do not share them.

byline.original: By JEREMY W. PETERS and MAGGIE HABERMAN

lead_paragraph: Mr. Cruz is said to place a distinctly softer emphasis on some of his most stridently conservative views when privately addressing people who might find them offensive.

headline.main: Ted Cruz, a Public Firebrand on Social Issues, Is Cooler When Wooing Donors
headline.print_headline: Cruz, a Public Firebrand on Social Issues, Is Cooler When Wooing Big Donors
